lead_paragraph: Underdogs had their days, plenty of them, in 2015: Leicester City snapping at the heels of England's Premier League giants, Japan beating South Africa at the rugby World Cup, Roberta Vinci derailing Serena Williams' drive for a calendar year Grand Slam.

headline.print_headline: Column: Want a Glimpse of Sports' Future in 2016?
headline.main: Column: Want a Glimpse of Sports' Future in 2016?
